title: Working in Clark County: Stephanie Whitchurch, Discover Balance
author: Hope Martinez; Columbian news assistant Published August
description: In the hustle and bustle of modern-day life, it's easy for one to quickly become stressed out and overwhelmed. Feeling strung out for too long can start to take a negative toll on a person's well-bein
cleaned_text: In the hustle and bustle of modern-day life, it's easy for one to quickly become stressed out and overwhelmed. Feeling strung out for too long can start to take a negative toll on a person's well-being. When it comes to treatments focused on relaxation and overall health, there's a multitude of services to choose from at Discover Balance.
